I wasn’t sure what to expect I’ve looked at it multiple times. Finally, bought it. I’m 5’0”, pear shaped, and 165 lbs and the XL fit perfectly! The picture makes it look straight but it actually gave me an hourglass shape. I normally wear a size 12 in US sizes.  Definitely worth the price.

Pretty color, length and short sleeves are great, unfortunately the top part is cut very slim and does not fit in the shoulders. I'm a size 14, guess I have quarterback shoulders. Material is light and comfortable. I had to return it.

I wasn’t expecting a lot because this dress was such a great price. I don’t typically wear dresses, but we were going to an outdoor concert and temperatures were close to 100.  This dress was super comfortable and nice and flowy. I don’t usually like the keyhole sleeves, but these actually looked just fine. The colors were very nice and the fabric was light-weight and not at all see through.  I did go a size up, and I’m glad I did. It probably would have still fit, but in this heat I wanted as little touching me as possible!  It was slightly wrinkled when I received it, but I didn’t have time to wash it. So I threw some wrinkle-releaser spray on it and hung it in my bathroom while showering. It was fine to wear.

This is a simple Tshirt type dress that’s easy to pull on and go. Note* From the original order date to delivery date was quite a long time, so plan accordingly if ordering for a specific date or occasion. Thie print has good color saturation. It does not wrinkle easily. The fit is snug in the sleeves, but not intolerable. It fits tighter around the chest than hip area. Around the hips the fabric glides easily and is a comfortable, easy drape. Around the bust, it is tight enough to pucker a little. That could have some to do with the sleeves? Petite sizes, excpect a couple of inches below the knee in length. It has pockets! Great! Sometimes it looks like the side pockets stick out a little and I havent decided if that’s an issue. I believe other reviews mentioned this. If I find it unacceptable, I will sew one of the pockets shut to give it a straighter line on one side and keep the pocket on only one side. Overall, I like the dress.
